info.title: Chrome DevTools Protocol
info.description: Auto-generated OpenAPI 3.0 specification for Chrome Dev Tools Protocol's types, events, commands

EventDetachedParams.description: Fired when remote debugging connection is about to be terminated. Contains detach reason.

reason.description: The reason why connection has been terminated.

EventTargetCrashedParams.description: Fired when debugging target has crashed

EventTargetReloadedAfterCrashParams.description: Fired when debugging target has reloaded after crash
